name: Neng Zhang 0001
content: Neng Zhang’s Home Page | Neng Zhang’s Home Page About Me I am an Associate Professor at the School of Computer Science, Central China Normal University, China. I got my Ph.D degree in December 2017 under the supervision of Prof. Keqing He from Wuhan University, China. My research focuses on mining knowledge from rich Software Engineering data and developing knowledge-based intelligent approaches to improving developers' productivity and software quality. During my research work, I am interested in adopting various techniques including data mining, knowledge graph, natural language processing, machine learning, and program analysis. My Chinese homepage can be found at here. Experience 2024.10 - Present, Associate Professor, Central China Normal University 2021.04 - 2024.10, Assistant Professor, Sun Yat-sen University 2018.12 - 2021.03, Postdoc, Zhejiang University Education 2014.09 - 2017.12, PhD, Wuhan University 2012.09 - 2014.06, MSc, Wuhan University 2008.09 - 2012.06, BSc, Wuhan University Publications Journal [1] Siyu Nan, Jian Wang, Neng Zhang, Duantengchuan Li, Bing Li.
